Instance Method# drop(while:)

iOS 13.0+iPadOS 13.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.15+tvOS 13.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 6.0+

```
func drop(while predicate: (Elements.Element) -> Bool) -> Publishers.Sequence<DropWhileSequence<Elements>, Failure>
```

Available when `Elements` conforms to `Sequence` and `Failure` conforms to `Error`.## [See Also](/documentation/Combine/Publishers/Sequence/drop(while:)#see-also)
